languages.text: {n}Ваш крик тонок, как предсмертный вопль. Голос кажется невыносимо визгливым. Но его силы хватает, чтобы тварь, попытавшаяся укусить вас, отошла подальше.{/n}

traits.locale_text: Слышим движением. Чувствуем, что боль прекратилась.

languages.text: {n}Your shout is as thin as a death cry and unbearably shrill. Still, it is just strong enough to make the creature stop trying to bite you and back off.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваш крик тонок, как предсмертный вопль. Голос кажется невыносимо визгливым. Но его силы хватает, чтобы тварь, попытавшаяся укусить вас, отошла подальше.{/n}

{n}Your shout is as thin as a death cry and unbearably shrill. Still, it is just strong enough to make the creature stop trying to bite you and back off.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的呼喊声仿佛临死前的惊叫一样，细得令人无法忍受。但即便如此，你的声音还是吓退了那匹马。它向后退去，不再试图咬你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your shout is as thin as a death cry and unbearably shrill. Still, it is just strong enough to make the creature stop trying to bite you and back off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的呼喊声仿佛临死前的惊叫一样，细得令人无法忍受。但即便如此，你的声音还是吓退了那匹马。它向后退去，不再试图咬你。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu grito es tan débil como un estertor y se te antoja insoportablemente agudo. Aun así, basta para hacer que la criatura deje de mordisquearte y retroceda.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your shout is as thin as a death cry and unbearably shrill. Still, it is just strong enough to make the creature stop trying to bite you and back off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu grito es tan débil como un estertor y se te antoja insoportablemente agudo. Aun así, basta para hacer que la criatura deje de mordisquearte y retroceda.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bağırışın, bir ölüm çığlığı kadar zayıf ve dayanılmaz derecede tiz. Yine de yaratığın seni ısırmaya çalışmayı bırakıp geri çekilmesini sağlayacak kadar güçlü.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your shout is as thin as a death cry and unbearably shrill. Still, it is just strong enough to make the creature stop trying to bite you and back off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bağırışın, bir ölüm çığlığı kadar zayıf ve dayanılmaz derecede tiz. Yine de yaratığın seni ısırmaya çalışmayı bırakıp geri çekilmesini sağlayacak kadar güçlü.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの叫び声は、死の叫びのように力なく、耐えがたく甲高い。しかし、馬があなたを噛もうとするのを止め、それを後ろに後退させるのには十分な程度には強い。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your shout is as thin as a death cry and unbearably shrill. Still, it is just strong enough to make the creature stop trying to bite you and back off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの叫び声は、死の叫びのように力なく、耐えがたく甲高い。しかし、馬があなたを噛もうとするのを止め、それを後ろに後退させるのには十分な程度には強い。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bien qu'aussi faible que la plainte d'un mourant et particulièrement strident, votre cri suffit à repousser la créature qui cesse d'essayer de vous mordre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your shout is as thin as a death cry and unbearably shrill. Still, it is just strong enough to make the creature stop trying to bite you and back off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bien qu'aussi faible que la plainte d'un mourant et particulièrement strident, votre cri suffit à repousser la créature qui cesse d'essayer de vous mordre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dein Rufen ist schwach wie ein Todesschrei und unerträglich schrill. Allerdings ist es laut genug, dass die Kreatur von dir ablässt und zurückweicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your shout is as thin as a death cry and unbearably shrill. Still, it is just strong enough to make the creature stop trying to bite you and back off.{/n}
